title: International Epidemiology Workshop
text: The Epidemiology Commitee of ISPP (International Society of Plant Pathology) is pleased to announce the venue of the 13th International Epidemiology Workshop, in Foz do Iguaçu, Brazil. The meeting will take place in Foz do Iguaçu from 9-12 April 2024, Interludium hotel. Check here regularly for more information about the meeting.

title: International Epidemiology Workshop
text:
About
The International Epidemiology Workshop (IEW) is the principal working group of plant disease epidemiology.  This is an organization with a rich history, and has met approximately every 5 years since 1963. The regularly published proceedings of the IEW include recognized benchmarks of epidemiology. A significant feature of this conference is that all participants meet as a unified group.

title: International Epidemiology Workshop
text:
About the meeting
The International Epidemiology Workshop (IEW) is the principal working group of plant disease epidemiology. This is an organization with a rich history, and has met approximately every 5 years since 1963. The regularly published proceedings of the IEW include recognized benchmarks of epidemiology. A significant feature of this conference is that all participants meet as a unified group.

title: International Epidemiology Workshop
text:
IEW13 Brazil - First announcement
The Epidemiology Commitee of ISPP (International Society of Plant Pathology) is pleased to announce the venue of the 13th International Epidemiology Workshop. The meeting will take place in Foz do Iguaçu, Brazil from 9-12 April 2024 at the Interludium hotel. Check here regularly for more information about the meeting.
